title: Flexible scheduling accommodates care economy participation
description: Flexible scheduling accommodates care economy participation
content:
Scenario: Flexible scheduling accommodates care economy participation
    Given Sarah needs to manage children's schedules, parent appointments, household tasks
    And rigid work schedules create impossible conflicts
    When Sarah's work schedule is determined
    Then the workplace_elohim should coordinate with personal_agent
    And flexible scheduling should accommodate care responsibilities
    And Sarah should be able to handle family emergencies without job risk
    And workplace should enable sustainable work-care balance
    And flexibility should be policy, not personal favor
